content:
The Centre de Recerca Matemàtica (CRM) in Barcelona is hosting an intensive research programme on higher & homotopical structures.
The opening workshop just finished yesterday; all talks were recorded and you can find them on the website.

Starting next week there will be a weekly online seminar. The first talk is

  • Tuesday 16th February 2021 at 16:00 (Central European Time)
  • Speaker: André Joyal
  • Title: Higher Sheaf Theory

The zoom link is on the website.

I will be the second speaker on Tuesday 23rd February at 10:00 (CET).
Hi Amar, I believe the link to the seminar series is wrong since it brings me to the workshop page
In a little more than one hour (10:00 AM CET) I will be talking about my paper.
